title: Business Analytics for Managers
description: Through lecture and online delivery, students will be introduced to key techniques for using data to make informed management decisions. Covers probability, statistics, decision analysis, and optimization techniques. Emphasizes managerial applications in such areas as operations management, marketing, and finance. Letter grades only. Students will not receive credit for both MGT 403R and MGT 403. This is a distance education course. Prerequisites: Executive MBA student or instructor approval or department approval.
